entry.title: RT Ryan Wyatt: I am beyond excited to share with you that @0xPolygon is going carbon neutral in 2022. 🌍 - This means that every transaction is acco...
entry.summary: RT Ryan Wyatt I am beyond excited to share with you that @0xPolygon is going carbon neutral in 2022. 🌍 - This means that every transaction is accounted for and its environmental impact is offset. ⛓️- Polygon will work on becoming the first blockchain to be climate POSITIVE.
